technology.description:
Check this to generate Facet navigation features associated to the designed objects of your class models.
Facetmap is a library allowing to produce facet navigation through object categories.
S-IDE allows to optimize the generation of the Facetmap components based on the newly designed objects of your class models.
technology.name: Facetmap

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate Facet navigation components on the major release 2 of the Facetmap library.
Facetmap 2.x is one of the more efficient and robust Facet navigation component which may be easily embedded in web application.
Additionally to content generation, S-IDE provides the generated components to integrate Facet navigation features according to the designed application objects.

configurationParameter.documentation:
Set this value to the Alfresco Tomcat directory path in order the deployer puts the packaged war file.
This option is mandatory.
configurationParameter.label: Tomcat installation directory
